Package Model

Class ModelManager

java.lang.Object
Model.ModelManager
public class ModelManager extends Object
A class for Managing the game list, player list, event list and reservation list.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Group 6

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(String name, String studentID, boolean membership)
      Add a player to the PlayerList file.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the player
      studentID - Student ID of the player
      membership - True - if is a member. False - if is a guest.

    • editPlayer

      public void editPlayer(String name, String studentID, boolean membership)
      Edit information of the Player from PlayerList file.
      Parameters:
      name - new Name of the Player
      studentID - Student ID of a player
      membership - Revoke / Assign membership
